testcase.name: runScenario["Top Deals and Flight Booking Links Shown on Homepage", "Homepage Looks and Feel"](1)

@OffersPage @TCID_8 Scenario Outline: Search experience for product search in both home and Offer Page # src/test/java/features/searchProduct.feature:12
@PlaceOrder @TCID_9 Scenario Outline: Verifying items added on lading page are showing on checkout page # src/test/java/features/verifyCheckoutPage.feature:14
@HomePage @TCID_10 Scenario: Top Deals and Flight Booking Links Shown on Homepage # src/test/java/features/homePageValidations.feature:4
@HomePage @TCID_11 Scenario: Correct Footer text Shown on Homepage # src/test/java/features/homePageValidations.feature:10 Given User is on Grrenkart Landing Page # stepDefinitions.LandingPageStepDefinitions.user_is_on_grrenkart_landing_page() Given User is on Grrenkart Landing Page # stepDefinitions.LandingPageStepDefinitions.user_is_on_grrenkart_landing_page()
